description: Perhaps our most versatile pants, the RESISTOR™ Chino can do it all. Our exclusive performance fabric features unparalleled stretch with rebound for a fit that doesn't bag out over time. Incredibly tough yet as soft as cotton, the RESISTOR handles abuse, sheds moisture, and provides superior flexibility for every adventure. Sophisticated chino style, superior comfort, and rugged everyday performance. Resistance is futile.
name: Kuhl Resistor Chino, 32" Inseam - Mens
